text: IMG-20200311-WA0016 Hossein Karimi (); is an Iranian Football Midfielder who currently plays for Iranian football club Nassaji Mazandaran in the Azadegan League. ==Club career== ===Early years=== He started his career with Fajr Sepasi Academy. As summer 2011 he promoted to first team by Mahmoud Yavari. He made his debut for Fajr Sepasi January 29, 2011 against Sepahan.http://www.ffiri.ir/league/101/club/10020/%D9%BE%DB%8C%DA%A9%D8%A7%D9%86-%D8%AA%D9%87%D8%B1%D8%A7%D9%86/%D8%B3%DB%8C%D8%AF%D8%AD%D8%B3%DB%8C%D9%86-%DA%A9%D8%B1%DB%8C%D9%85%DB%8C/01833633-19c8-4786-bd58-403771d945b5/player/ ===Paykan=== Karimi joined Paykan in winter 2013. He made his debut for Paykan as January 12, 2014 against Aboumoslem as a starter while he netted in 45th minute.
